plot: A miserly man tries to force his daughter to marry a wealthy man, but she has fallen in love with a penniless entertainer
title: Cheonchun ilbeonji
plot_es: A miserly man tries to force his daughter to marry a wealthy man, but she has fallen in love with a penniless entertainer
plot_en: A miserly man tries to force his daughter to marry a wealthy man, but she has fallen in love with a penniless entertainer
